00029 #ifndef __BMESH_INLINE_H__
00030 #define __BMESH_INLINE_H__
00031 
00032 /* stuff for dealing with header flags */
00033 #define BM_elem_flag_test(     ele, hflag)      _bm_elem_flag_test     (&(ele)->head, hflag)
00034 #define BM_elem_flag_test_bool(ele, hflag)      _bm_elem_flag_test_bool(&(ele)->head, hflag)
00035 #define BM_elem_flag_enable(   ele, hflag)      _bm_elem_flag_enable   (&(ele)->head, hflag)
00036 #define BM_elem_flag_disable(  ele, hflag)      _bm_elem_flag_disable  (&(ele)->head, hflag)
00037 #define BM_elem_flag_set(      ele, hflag, val) _bm_elem_flag_set      (&(ele)->head, hflag, val)
00038 #define BM_elem_flag_toggle(   ele, hflag)      _bm_elem_flag_toggle   (&(ele)->head, hflag)
00039 #define BM_elem_flag_merge(    ele_a, ele_b)    _bm_elem_flag_merge    (&(ele_a)->head, &(ele_b)->head)
00040 
00041 BLI_INLINE char _bm_elem_flag_test(const BMHeader *head, const char hflag)
00042 {
00043     return head->hflag & hflag;
00044 }
00045 
00046 BLI_INLINE short _bm_elem_flag_test_bool(const BMHeader *head, const char hflag)
00047 {
00048     return (head->hflag & hflag) != 0;
00049 }
00050 
00051 BLI_INLINE void _bm_elem_flag_enable(BMHeader *head, const char hflag)
00052 {
00053     head->hflag |= hflag;
00054 }
00055 
00056 BLI_INLINE void _bm_elem_flag_disable(BMHeader *head, const char hflag)
00057 {
00058     head->hflag &= ~hflag;
00059 }
00060 
00061 BLI_INLINE void _bm_elem_flag_set(BMHeader *head, const char hflag, const int val)
00062 {
00063     if (val)  _bm_elem_flag_enable(head,  hflag);
00064     else      _bm_elem_flag_disable(head, hflag);
00065 }
00066 
00067 BLI_INLINE void _bm_elem_flag_toggle(BMHeader *head, const char hflag)
00068 {
00069     head->hflag ^= hflag;
00070 }
00071 
00072 BLI_INLINE void _bm_elem_flag_merge(BMHeader *head_a, BMHeader *head_b)
00073 {
00074     head_a->hflag = head_b->hflag = head_a->hflag | head_b->hflag;
00075 }
00076 
00108 #define BM_elem_index_get(ele)           _bm_elem_index_get(&(ele)->head)
00109 #define BM_elem_index_set(ele, index)    _bm_elem_index_set(&(ele)->head, index)
00110 
00111 BLI_INLINE void _bm_elem_index_set(BMHeader *head, const int index)
00112 {
00113     head->index = index;
00114 }
00115 
00116 BLI_INLINE int _bm_elem_index_get(const BMHeader *head)
00117 {
00118     return head->index;
00119 }
00120 
00121 #endif /* __BMESH_INLINE_H__ */
